nodes.text: The Imperial lieutenant Kourterel had a child. In 3 ABY, Prelate Verge, a young member of the Imperial Ruling Council, asked after the child and promised that a detail of stormtroopers would protect Kourterel's family from rebels on Vanzeist. Captain Tabor Seitaron, an officer who taught military history at Carida Academy, later looked back at the the moment when reviewing Verge's personality from the time they had spent together.
Kourterel's child was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
